Houston.Allbach House:
The Anson M. Allebach (registered as Allbach) House is a house located in Houston, Texas listed on the National Register of Historic Places.


== History ==
The house at 2023 Arlington is contained within the boundaries of the Houston Heights, which was designated a Multiple Resource Area (MRA) by the National Register Program on June 22, 1983. Although the spelling of the name in the National Register nomination is Allbach, the actual correct spelling of the name is Allebach.
